content.question: Which of the following describes the law of supply?

choices.label: An increase in the price of a good will decrease the quantity demanded.
The price of a good will increase if production input costs increase.
An increase in taxes will decrease the supply of a good.
An increase in the number of sellers will increase the supply of a good.
An increase in the price of a good will increase the quantity supplied.

content.answer: An increase in the price of a good will increase the quantity supplied.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
